long_description:
# mywhiteblock
A white block that you can paint. [My Paint](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Don/mypaint/) is required to color the block. You can paint it all the colors of dye. 
You can paint it 15 different colors. You can repaint it. You can scrape the paint off to get back to a white block. 
Imagine the colorful things you could create!

You can make fences, fence rails and gates. Stairs and walls are also buildable.

You can also make millwork with the blocks using [mymillork](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Don/mymillwork/).

If you wishes you could have bricks with this then download [mybricks](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Don/mybricks/).

How about siding? [mysiding](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Don/mysiding/) will do it.

Try [myholeinthewall](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Don/myholeinthewall/) for cool blocks.

Do you need slopes? [myslopes](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Don/myslopes/) got you covered.

Don't forget to download [mypaint](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Don/mypaint/). It is required to use this mod.

Code Licence - MIT

Media Licence - CC0
name: mywhiteblock
title: My White Block
